Reading through these comments, I see a remarkable socio-cultural clash theme emerging between the US and... the Dutch! The US — a land where anyone from anywhere can pick themselves up, put down roots, make a life for themselves by dint of their own hard work — has a very different mindset to the Danes and Dutch, where services are subsidized by the government.

These comments illustrate how differently these two mindsets think.

My Life as a Zucchini is a movie with beautiful drawings by a pretty traditional plot. Brother's relationship between Zucchini and Madame, are enough to make the film good.
